summary: TOYOTA COROLLA CE 2007. CHECK ENGINE LIGHT WAS ON. CRUISING ON FREEWAY AT SPEED LIMIT WHEN ENGINE SHIFTS INTO A STALL. CANNOT ACCELERATE AND MUST PULL OVER. SHUT DOWN CAR AND RESTART, WORKS FINE BUT ENGINE LIGHT STILL ON. CALLS DEALER, THEY SAY A TSB WAS RELEASED CONCERNING A FAULTY ENGINE CONTROL UNIT IN SOME 2007 COROLLAS. TSB WAS RELEASED IN JULY 2009. I WAS NEVER INFORMED OF POTENTIAL PROBLEM UNTIL I CALLED SERVICE DEPARTMENT AND DESCRIBED EVENT. SCHEDULED FOR DIAGNOSIS AND REPAIR IN TWO DAYS, DEALER SAYS IF IT FALLS UNDER TSB  THE ECU WILL BE REPLACED UNDER WARRANTY. VERY DANGEROUS PROBLEM, I WAS DRIVING LATE AT  NIGHT WITH VERY LITTLE TRAFFIC. IF THIS HAD HAPPENED DURING BUSY RUSH HOUR TRAFFIC OR EVEN ON CROWDED LOCAL ROAD HIGH RISK OF ACCIDENT. *TR
